item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9, post:4, topic:332316”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=428754.msg3147547#msg3147547 date=1268228002]
try this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")&& playerRights >= 0){ //Voule Command Generator if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("home")){ //Voule Command Generator toX = 3182; toY = 3440; sM("welcome to our home!!");
change coords to what u want and maybe u need to change sM to sendMessage and toX TeletoX hope i helped
[/quote]
Yes i saved them be4 i compiled
no? that wouldn’t do anything because he probably doesn’t have “toX” (or TeletoX) declared in his client.java

did you remember saving your files…?[/quote]
Yeh i always saved them still no solution

item.title: Need help - still nothing is working :(:(:(
item.dc:creator: @Eson Eson
item.description:
@Eson wrote:

I’m using Evoluitonx client + source but i can’t change anything in client.java!!! what i do =

for example i try to change command of ::home in client . java

if(command.startsWith(“home”)){
triggerTele(3093, 3493, 0);
brightness = 4;
}

i just change coord numbers i compile i restart = NOTHING HAPPENS!!! now the funny thing is my friend does like exactly same thing i do but for him it does work!!! i tried to redownload source still NOTHING HAPPENS when i try it…and compiler is good because when i try to add like an npc in autspawn that does work!!! :mad: :mad: I need HELP :S if i can’t edit client.java what’s the point of making rsps then :S

Compiler code @echo off @TITLE EvolutionX if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
